@akajaykarthik
If u r in a illusion that mkv is better than mp4 then let me tell u its nt..they both give same quality..
mp4 is compatible with dvd players. ps3, xbox360...so u can watch these mp4 files nt only on ur pc bt also can play them on ur tv through those devices...
mkv cannot do that..

wats with fight over mp4 and mkv both formats are gud and besides yu dnt need to encode from mkv to mp4 or vice versa yu can just mux them top get same filesize and same qaulity in under a minute so wats the prob...
prefer whichever format yu want... its your wish....

@MitZep
no dude its nt a fight..some people dont know the difference so i hv no problem explaining the difference..

about mp4 or mkv i prefer mp4 and goku 61 together...small size good quality and mkv didnt work on my bravia...so i am happy with your torrents so much :)=...

Well both mkv & mp4 have their advantages..
mkv can store multiple audio/video/subtitle streams.. mp4 is compatible with most of dvdplayers/tv/etc
no difference in audio/video quality :D
